alert.note: Alert for Newton; Rockdale (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 05 at 6:00AM EST until January 07 at 1:43AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Yellow River at Gees Mill Road affecting Rockdale and Newton Counties. For the Yellow River Basin...including Gees Mill Road...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Yellow River at Gees Mill Road. * WHEN...Until early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 11 feet, Flood Stage is reached. Minor flooding begins in the woodlands...fields and pasture along the river upstream and downstream from the gage on Gees Mill Road in Rockdale County. Portions of Sockwell Road by the river in Newton County will be around two feet under water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:30 AM EST Thursday the stage was 10.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this morning to a crest of 11.5 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 11 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
